Name: Summoner's Arcane Acquisition
Story Background: Summoners channel arcane energies to intercept enemy spells, transforming them into powerful elemental beings.
Ability: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, create an Elemental creature token with power and toughness equal to that spell's mana cost.
Appearance Description: Arcane runes glow as the summoner conjures an elemental spirit, drawing power from the defeated spell.
